title: AutoML App Suite

title: Pre-Covid and Post-Covid Twitter sentiment analysis
desc: Analysis of Twitter sentiment shifts before and after Covid-19 using NLP. Reveals social and emotional impacts of the pandemic through social media data analysis.

title: Image Forgery Localization with Deep Learning
desc: Deep learning model for detecting and visualizing manipulated regions in images. Creates masks to highlight forged areas for digital forensics.

title: Text summarization with PageRank
desc: Enhanced text summarization using cosine distance and PageRank algorithms. Generates concise summaries by combining semantic similarity with sentence importance scoring.

desc: ML system for clustering and classifying web pages using word vectors. Groups similar content and categorizes new pages to improve content organization.

title: Multi-class weather recognition from still image with Deep Learning
desc: CNN-based model for classifying weather conditions from images. Enables automated weather monitoring.
